snippet.title: Enhance Performance in Implementing the Security of Partially Reconfigurable Embedded Systems
snippet.description: System security means protecting confidentiality and integrity of input or output data to as well as the safety of the system. To meet stated security requirements, designers will ...

snippet.title: A guide to new storage technologies for legacy hardware
snippet.description: With these novel storage solutions from various Asian manufacturers, you can break your reliance on years-old hard drives and floppy disks deployed with legacy terminals.

snippet.title: 10 reasons I can't wait to get a Microsoft Surface tablet
snippet.description: Will the Surface tablet alleviate some of the shortcomings of existing tablet offerings? Veteran tablet user Deb Shinder thinks it will -- and she's eager to put it to the test.

snippet.title: DIY: Recover lost files with Recuva
snippet.description: The task of recovering lost files is often painstaking and costly. Jack Wallen recommends saving time and your IT budget by using the free Recuva file recovery tool.

snippet.title: A smartphone that does it all: The possible dream?
snippet.description: The dream of many on-the-go professionals, who are burdened with carrying a phone, a laptop, and maybe a tablet, is the day when one device will do it all. Deb Shinder explores whe...

snippet.title: Office 2010 annoyances that I can no longer ignore
snippet.description: Even when you like a software package, certain aspects of it may bug you. Deb Shinder shares her list of the most vexing Office 2010 features.

snippet.title: Extend smartphone functionality with hardware add-ons
snippet.description: You can bring your smartphone closer to being the ultimate "ultra-portable computer" with hardware add-ons. Dell Shinder tells you about some options that are available.

snippet.title: The 10 biggest Office 2010 annoyances
snippet.description: Even when you like a software package, certain aspects of it may bug you. Deb Shinder shares her list of the most vexing Office 2010 features.

snippet.title: 10 reasons why I'll be passing on the iPad
snippet.description: As the iPad buzz turns from speculation to evaluation, the early reviews are starting to roll in. See why Deb Shinder says she won't be lining up outside the Apple Store for an iP...

snippet.title: Eight reasons to trade in your iPhone for a Droid
snippet.description: Don't let the iPhone's pretty exterior cause you to overlook the Droid's features. Deb Shinder details eight ways in which the Droid outshines the iPhone.
